name: Nexus Survival
description:
DESCRIPTION:

Who will fight by your side when the time comes? God or the Devil? You decide your fate in Nexus Survival.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

GAME CONTROLS:

MOVE: WASD

SHOOT: USE MOUSE CURSOR TO SHOOT

ESC: PAUSE
